creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
Hi there..
In the user guide of tomcat, it was given that we have to create the mod_jesrv.so inorder to integrate Apache with Tomcat.
I tried to create the mod_jserv.so by using apxs tool on sun solaris.
But it was giving some errors.
How to solve this problem?
with rgds,
Rao
